divs: sighting detailsi was driving as a delivery driver on mckee road, san jose, california, somewhere between north king road and north 33rd street. it was (very approximate time) about 2:00 p.m. on a weekday. i was driving from north king road going towards hwy 101. i was extremely busy and extremely preoccupied with communicating with my dispatcher via my nextel. in the midst of this extreme preoccupation with my work, i suddenly saw (as i was driving) a very large, circular gray-colored object approximately 15 feet above a house, hovering and not moving (about the same size as the house) on the south side of mckee road (my left). it was not moving. i felt stunned. at first, i thought two things: i thought it was either a helium man-made craft resembling a "flying saucer" or an actual ufo. i was fixed on this object in the sky (approximately 15 feet from a house), but i was so preoccupied with my work and communications with my dispatcher (and driving safely) that i did not look back at this viewing immediately. it was probably before i reached north 33rd street that i finally turned around to view same spot. when i finally turned around to view this object, i then saw that the gray circular object had disappeared. i could not see it anymore. i was still so preoccupied with my work\deliveries that i did not stop to record dates and exact streets. i was stunned (and very busy at work). if it was helium man-made it wouldn't have disappeared so quickly. the date is very approximate. the time is very approximate. i'm pretty sure the street is correct. i absolutely know what i saw. the most prevelant feeling i felt was stunned. simply stunned.
Summary: hovering approx 15 feet above a house, not moving.
